scripts.postinstall: rm -r node_modules && cd ../../ && npm install && npx nx sync-deps sandbox && npx nx ensure-symlink sandbox
scripts.test:visual:ios:compare: reg-cli e2e/ios/screenshots e2e/ios/tempScreenshots e2e/ios/diffScreenshots -T 0.0001 -R e2e/ios/diffScreenshots/report.html -J e2e/ios/diffScreenshots/result.json
scripts.test:visual:android:compare: reg-cli e2e/android/screenshots e2e/android/tempScreenshots e2e/android/diffScreenshots -T 0.0001 -R e2e/android/diffScreenshots/report.html -J e2e/android/diffScreenshots/result.json
